channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Is Hearing Technology Working For Us, Or Against Us?
item.description: Hearing technology is advancing, but is it making life easier or harder? Bill Schiffmiller explores its impact on people, workplaces, and brands.

item.title: Samsung’s Latest Special Offer For Galaxy Phone Buyers
item.description: Samsung makes several new offers to Galaxy Phone buyers in the U.S.

item.title: Crossroads Of Innovation: The Promise And Peril Of Techs Biggest Gatherings
item.description: Are tech conferences too expensive? Should AI/tech conferences include more then industry insiders and be more accessible to the general public ?
